#### Variational approximation of the posterior
```{r}
l2regmodel = stan_model(model_code = l2regression)
vb_fit = vb(l2regmodel, data = c(data, prior), algorithm = "meanfield")
s <- summary(vb_fit, probs = c(0.025, 0.975))
s$summary  # all chaines merged
```
